Greeting_Rain_M_H:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thanks for coming out. I know it's not fun
traveling in this weather.
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, and while you're here...would you like
me to tell your fortune?
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Great! First, tell me which instrument's
sound you want to hear most right now.
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your luckiest results will come from
wearing coordinated outfits, all from the
same series.
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Haha, you make your own luck, eh?<sp:5:1:0>
Sounds about right for you.<sp:0:4:0>To me, a lucky day is one where you see
a shooting star, a rainbow, or maybe an
aurora if you're really lucky.<sp:0:4:0>Everyone has their superstitions on how
to bend luck in their favor. It could be fun
to come up with a few of your own.
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your luckiest results will come from going
around talking to people.
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your luckiest results will come from taking
a leisurely horseback ride.
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your luckiest results will come from doing
some cooking.
Talk0008: <sp:3:0:2:0000>That means your lucky direction is north.
Greeting_Noon_M_H: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Nice day, isn't it? Thanks for stopping by!
Talk0009: <sp:3:0:2:0000>That means your lucky direction is south.
Greeting_Snow_M_H: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thanks for braving the snow to see us.
Greeting_Morning_M_H: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Good morning. Nice of you to stop by!
Greeting_Evening_M_H: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Good evening. Nice of you to stop by!
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well? <sp:5:1:0>Did any of those fortunes spark an
idea in you?<sp:0:4:0>Sometimes you might find yourself not
sure of what to do next, like you can't
remember your big-picture goals.<sp:0:4:0>That's the time to consider letting fate
take the wheel by following your fortune.
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your luckiest results will come from filling
out your compendium.
Talk0010: <sp:3:0:2:0000>That means your lucky direction is west.
Talk0011: <sp:3:0:2:0000>That means your lucky direction is east.
Greeting_Snow_M_H_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>I can't believe you're walking around like
that. <sp:5:1:0>Is it some kind of health trend?
Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're probably in a hurry to get back to
the road, but since you're here, why not
listen to our performance before you go?<sp:0:4:0>Putting some leeway into your schedule
is important even when you're in a hurry.
Maybe especially then!<sp:0:4:0>You've got to take time to let your body
and mind rest before you go charging
off again.<sp:0:4:0>If you don't, then you could end up like
meâ€”<sp:5:0:0>stuck in a hole.
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You have a pretty casual attitude toward
clothing, huh?<sp:0:4:0>I can relate. Personally, I don't like to
sleep in my clothes.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>That said...uh...I do try to put in the
effort when I'm around people...
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Now that the Great Fairies are back with
us, the stables are more cheerful and
vibrant places to be.<sp:0:4:0>We intend to keep going from stable to
stable and improving our performances
every day to ease people's hearts.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wanted to work on my wagon-driving skills too,
but Mastro put his foot down on that one.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm putting my whole heart and soul into
my horn sound. If you have time, unwind
a bit while listening to us play.
